languages.text: "Лишь в Омниссию, что знает все и постигает все. В попытке приблизиться к нему я также готов постигать все, дабы познать все. Деус Механикус даровал нам один священный завет — Познание, все же прочие — рукотворные творения смертных".

"Only in the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending. As I strive to get closer to Him, I, too, am prepared to comprehend all, so that I may know all. The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge. The rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."
languages.original_text: "Лишь в Омниссию, что знает все и постигает все. В попытке приблизиться к нему я также готов постигать все, дабы познать все. Деус Механикус даровал нам один священный завет — Познание, все же прочие — рукотворные творения смертных".

The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge; the rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge. The rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我只相信全知全能的欧姆尼塞亚。当我努力接近祂时，我也做好了无所不知的准备。只有这样，才能做到无所不晓。万机之神只赐予了我们一条神圣的戒律，那就是知识。其他的一切，都不过是凡人思想的造物。”
languages.original_text: "Only in the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending. As I strive to get closer to Him, I, too, am prepared to comprehend all, so that I may know all. The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge. The rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."

traits.locale_text: “我只相信全知全能的欧姆尼塞亚。当我努力接近祂时，我也做好了无所不知的准备。只有这样，才能做到无所不晓。万机之神只赐予了我们一条神圣的戒律，那就是知识。其他的一切，都不过是凡人思想的造物。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Solo en el Omnissiah, que todo lo sabe y todo lo comprende. Al esforzarme en acercarme a él debo prepararme para comprenderlo todo y así saberlo todo. El Deus Mechanicus nos dio un sagrado mandamiento, el del Conocimiento. El resto son creaciones artificiales de mentes mortales».
languages.original_text: "Only in the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending. As I strive to get closer to Him, I, too, am prepared to comprehend all, so that I may know all. The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge. The rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."

traits.locale_text: «Solo en el Omnissiah, que todo lo sabe y todo lo comprende. Al esforzarme en acercarme a él debo prepararme para comprenderlo todo y así saberlo todo. El Deus Mechanicus nos dio un sagrado mandamiento, el del Conocimiento. El resto son creaciones artificiales de mentes mortales».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「すべてを知り、すべてを包む万機神においてのみ。主に近づこうと努力するにつれて、自分もまたすべてを理解する用意ができています。デウス・メカニクスが自分たちに与えた神聖な戒めはひとつ、それが知識なのです。残りは人間の心が人工的に作り出したものだ」
languages.original_text: "Only in the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending. As I strive to get closer to Him, I, too, am prepared to comprehend all, so that I may know all. The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge. The rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."

traits.locale_text: 「すべてを知り、すべてを包む万機神においてのみ。主に近づこうと努力するにつれて、自分もまたすべてを理解する用意ができています。デウス・メカニクスが自分たちに与えた神聖な戒めはひとつ、それが知識なのです。残りは人間の心が人工的に作り出したものだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Nur an den Omnissiah, den Allwissenden, den Allverstehenden. Während ich danach strebe, ihm näherzukommen, bin auch ich vorbereitet, alles zu verstehen, auf das ich alles wissen kann. Der Deus Mechanicus hat uns ein heiliges Gebot gegeben, das Gebot des Wissens. Der Rest sind künstliche Werke sterblicher Gehirne."
languages.original_text: "Only in the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending. As I strive to get closer to Him, I, too, am prepared to comprehend all, so that I may know all. The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge. The rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."

traits.locale_text: "Nur an den Omnissiah, den Allwissenden, den Allverstehenden. Während ich danach strebe, ihm näherzukommen, bin auch ich vorbereitet, alles zu verstehen, auf das ich alles wissen kann. Der Deus Mechanicus hat uns ein heiliges Gebot gegeben, das Gebot des Wissens. Der Rest sind künstliche Werke sterblicher Gehirne."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Uniquement en l'Omnimessie, celui qui sait et comprend tout. Plus j'aspire à me rapprocher de Lui, plus je suis prêt, à mon tour, à tout comprendre pour ensuite tout savoir. Le Deus Mechanicus nous a donné un unique commandement sacré : la Connaissance. Tout le reste n'est que la création artificielle d'esprits mortels. »
languages.original_text: "Only in the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending. As I strive to get closer to Him, I, too, am prepared to comprehend all, so that I may know all. The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge. The rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."

traits.locale_text: « Uniquement en l'Omnimessie, celui qui sait et comprend tout. Plus j'aspire à me rapprocher de Lui, plus je suis prêt, à mon tour, à tout comprendre pour ensuite tout savoir. Le Deus Mechanicus nous a donné un unique commandement sacré : la Connaissance. Tout le reste n'est que la création artificielle d'esprits mortels. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Only in the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending. As I strive to get closer to Him, I, too, am prepared to comprehend all, so that I may know all. The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge. The rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."

languages.text: "Yalnızca her şeyi bilen, her şeyi idrak eden Hermesih'e. O'na daha yakın olmak için çabalıyorum ve her şeyi idrak edebilmeye, her şeyi bilebilmeye kendimi hazırlıyorum. Deus Mechanicus bize kutsal emanet olarak İrfanı vermiştir. Geri kalan her şey, ölümlü zihinlerin yapay yaratımlarıdır."
languages.original_text: "Only in the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending. As I strive to get closer to Him, I, too, am prepared to comprehend all, so that I may know all. The Deus Mechanicus gave us one sacred commandment, that of Knowledge. The rest are artificial creations of mortal minds."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca her şeyi bilen, her şeyi idrak eden Hermesih'e. O'na daha yakın olmak için çabalıyorum ve her şeyi idrak edebilmeye, her şeyi bilebilmeye kendimi hazırlıyorum. Deus Mechanicus bize kutsal bir emir verdi. İrfan emri. Geri kalan her şey ölümlü zihinlerin yapay yaratımlarıdır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
